message.name: ERR_DRAFTALLOCATION_XFV_ALLOC_UNALLOCAMT_CDT
message.locale: An invalid amount was specified for allocation. The amount exceeds the unallocated value.

message.name: ERR_DRAFTALLOCATION_XFV_ALLOC_UNALLOCAMT_DBT
message.locale: An invalid amount was specified for allocation. The amount exceeds the unallocated amount of the specified debit transaction.

message.name: ERR_DRAFTALLOCATION_XFV_ALLOCATIONS_LARGE
message.locale: Unable to perform the allocations specified. The total allocations will exceed the unallocated amount of the payment received.

message.name: ERR_DRAFTALLOCATION_XFV_ZEROAMOUNT
message.locale: An invalid amount was specified for allocation. Cannot allocate a zero amount.

message.name: ERR_DRAFTALLOCATION_FV_NO_ALLOCATION
message.locale: The payment cannot be allocated. It has either been reversed or fully allocated.

message.name: INF_DRAFTALLOCATION_FV_NO_ALLOCATION
message.locale: The payment cannot be allocated. It has either been reversed or fully allocated.

message.name: ERR_ALLOCATEPAYMENT_XFV_ALL_AND_AMOUNT
message.locale: Either Allocate All or a specified amount to allocate can be entered, not both.

message.name: ERR_ALLOCATEPAYMENT_LIABILITY_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The allocation amount must be applied to a liability. Please select a liability.
